name: zero-docs
description: Brief documentation to get start with zero framework
readme:
# zero-docs

To install dependencies:

```bash
bun install
```

To run:

```bash
bun run index.ts
```

This project was created using `bun init` in bun v1.3.1. [Bun](https://bun.com) is a fast all-in-one JavaScript runtime.
owner_bio: A lone wolf with coding habit..
